textos_fuente.text: PRIVATE EVENTS – Olds Havana HOME MENU PRIVATE EVENTS DELIVERY RESERVATIONS CATERING GIFT CARDS HOME MENU PRIVATE EVENTS DELIVERY RESERVATIONS CATERING GIFT CARDS MAIN MENU Close Close HOME MENU PRIVATE EVENTS DELIVERY RESERVATIONS CATERING GIFT CARDS AN EVENT IN THE HEART OF LITTLE HAVANA Host Your Private Event at Old’s Havana in Miami Make your celebration unforgettable at Old’s Havana Cuban Bar & Cocina in the heart of Little Havana. From corporate events and team-building to wedding rehearsals, birthdays, and private parties , our authentic Cuban atmosphere sets the perfect stage. Enjoy family-style dining, signature cocktails, live music, and interactive Mojito demos that bring the spirit of Cuba to your event.
